sentences.sContent: But I think both can coexist.
sentences.sCn: 但是我认为两者可以共存。

sentences.sContent: All of your data can coexist in the same database.
sentences.sContent_eng: All of your data can coexist in the same database.
sentences.sCn: 你所有的数据都可以在相同的数据库中共存。

remMethod.val: co(共同) + exist(存在) → 共存

trans.tranOther: if two different things coexist, they exist at the same time or in the same place
